```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(reticulate)
```

```{python read}
import pandas as pd
import altair as alt
fn = "../data/saratoga-house-prices.csv"
df = pd.read_csv(fn)
```

```{python basic-scatterplot}
ch0 = alt.Chart(df).mark_point().encode(
      x='Age',y='Price')
ch0.save("../images/altair-basic-scatterplot.html")
```

```{python color-baths}
ch1 = alt.Chart(df).mark_point().encode(
  x="Age", y="Price", color="Baths")
ch1.save("../images/altair-color-baths.html")
```
